jett.speaker: Jett
jett.dialogue: ALRIGHT EVERYBODY LISTEN UP, and especially *you*, Periwinkle.

jett.speaker: Peri
jett.dialogue: ( Aw man, I know I’m new but does he have to single me out like this?! )

jett.speaker: Jett
jett.dialogue: YOU ALL KNOW THE DRILL! Move into formation with the **ARROW KEYS**! I’d advise you all to *NOT* bump into each other back there like a batch of squabbling penguins, YOU HEAR ME? If you do, there’ll be some tough consequences, no doubt about it!

jett.speaker: Jett
jett.dialogue: Once we’ve all *clicked* into our designated spots, it’ll be easy breezy beautiful from there and we’ll be at our destination in no time. THEN you can mingle amongst yourselves. Make some friends, or get ready for the next migration or something. Just come back to the flock in one piece and we’ll set off. ***LET’S MOVE OUT!***

kenneth.speaker: kenneth
kenneth.dialogue: Astounding! You're a much better flier than I thought you would be. You've crossed off all of the beginner's flying techniques on my list, and it's only your first day!

kenneth.speaker: kenneth
kenneth.dialogue: Let me introduce myself. I'm Kenneth! I'm the wisest bird in the flock and I'm here to help you with whatever you need, my little Polioptila Caerulea!

kenneth.speaker: kenneth
kenneth.dialogue: Well, according to my statistics, I can see that you're having a little trouble with finding your spot in the formations. With every bird flying all over the place, I completely understand why!

kenneth.speaker: kenneth
kenneth.dialogue: That being said, what if I told you that I could calculate the exact spot you need to go to BEFORE we take off?

kenneth.speaker: peri
dialogue: I don't need your pity. Why are you helping me, anyway?

kenneth.speaker: kenneth
dialogue: No problem, my fellow passerine! It's my mission to help any bird in need because it's the right thing to do.
I do what I can to help anyone in need because it's the right thing to do!

kenneth.speaker: kenneth
dialogue: No matter where life takes you, remember always to be kind! You'll make new friends and fly through life much, much easier that way.
We go through this world with so much strife on our wings, so what good is living if we can't help out our fellow birds?

kenneth.speaker: kenneth
kenneth.dialogue: Now, then! I could lay out the math of how exactly I calculate your trajectory, but maybe it'd be best if I show you. Let's take to the skies!

siesta.speaker: siesta
siesta.dialogue: Heeyyy, Periwinkle... *yawn* How goes it? Having fuuuuun with the new flock?

siesta.speaker: peri
siesta.dialogue: Kind of? I'm trying to make friends but everyone is so much bigger and what if I say something wr-

siesta.speaker: siesta
siesta.dialogue: Let me cut you off there, little guy, you're going a liiiittle too fast for me... *yaaaaawn*

siesta.speaker: siesta
siesta.dialogue: Now see, I take it nice and slow, and I don't have to worry about anything. I don't bump into other birds, and I have all the time I want to get to my spot.

siesta.speaker: siesta
siesta.dialogue: It's just me, this pillow, and the sky above me. (And don't ask where I got the feathers for the pillow...) Understand?

siesta.speaker: peri
siesta.dialogue: I do! I do! As long as I take it easy and don't stress too much, I'll fit into the flock just fine!

sloane.speaker: sloane
sloane.dialogue: I AM SLOANE! Strongest bird in this flock and your new MENTOR, my fine fellow!

sloane.speaker: peri
dialogue: For the strongest bird in the flock, you seem pretty frail...

sloane.speaker: sloane
dialogue: YES! YOUR MENTOR! A guardian to teach you courage and the meaning of TRUE strength, what lies in your heart!
My stature says nothing about my true strength, my feathered friend. It's COURAGE, VULNERABILITY, and the strength to follow your HEART that matters!

sloane.speaker: sloane
sloane.dialogue: I CAN ALSO TEACH YOU SO MANY OTHER THINGS, YOUNG LAD! SUCH AS FLYING AND... and... um... uh...

sloane.speaker: sloane
sloane.dialogue: NOT HITTING THE OTHER BIRDS! Yes, what a brilliant idea from one such as myself! Such strong ideas from a strong bird!

sloane.speaker: sloane
sloane.dialogue: You, too, can be as shining as me, young one! What say you?

ending1.speaker: siesta
ending1.dialogue: You - *yawn* - just got through your first day! And you did so well that you had me on the edge of my seat! (And way past my bedtime...)

ending1.speaker: kenneth
ending1.dialogue: Your statistics are off the charts! I've never seen anything like it! You must let me do a study on you some time.

ending1.speaker: sloane
ending1.dialogue: EXCELLENT WORK, YOUNG ONE! I've never seen such strength in such a tiny body! You'll fit into this flock just fine, I just know it!

ending1.speaker: peri
ending1.dialogue: I can't believe it's only the first day and I've already met so many new birds! I couldn't have done it without you guys pushing me forward, thank you so much!

ending2.speaker: peri
ending2.dialogue: Well, that marks the end of my first day. I think I did well! And tomorrow, I'll do even better! Maybe I didn't make as many friends as I wanted to, but that's alright. I'll try again another day!

ending2.speaker: siesta
ending2.dialogue: Heyyy Peri, good job flying today... You should totally - *yawn* - come hang out with the flock some time.

ending2.speaker: peri
ending2.dialogue: Thank you! I'd love to hang out, I've just been so busy practicing...

ending2.speaker: siesta
ending2.dialogue: Actually, we're about to - *yawn* - head down to the ocean to catch some Z's... I mean, catch some waves... Wanna come?

ending2.speaker: peri
ending2.dialogue: Oh! Yeah, sure! Let me go get ready...

intro.speaker: peri
intro.dialogue: Man, I didn't do that well today. Maybe I should get some advice from a friend?

kenneth.speaker: kenneth
kenneth.dialogue: Greetings Periwinkle! How are you feeling today?

kenneth.speaker: peri
kenneth.dialogue: I'm not feeling well, Kenneth. I know you told me where to go, but I still missed my spot more than a featherful of times. Maybe I'll never get the hang of this.

kenneth.speaker: kenneth
kenneth.dialogue: Don't be so hard on yourself! Today is just a blip in the world's great pie chart.

kenneth.speaker: kenneth
kenneth.dialogue: Tomorrow, I know you'll do just fine. I'll even give you another heads up on where your spot is supposed to be, what do you say?

kenneth.speaker: peri
kenneth.dialogue: That's so sweet, Kenneth! I'm so glad to have a friend like you by my side. Tomorrow is a new day!

siesta.speaker: peri
siesta.dialogue: It's not going that well, Siesta. I did what you said and took it slow and easy, but I'm still a bad flier.

siesta.speaker: siesta
siesta.dialogue: Periwinkle, just because you didn't do well today doesn't mean you're a bad flier. It just means that you need a little more practice.

siesta.speaker: siesta
siesta.dialogue: Don't stress yourself out about it too much. Get some *yawn* rest and you'll be a brand new bird tomorrow.

siesta.speaker: peri
siesta.dialogue: You're right, Siesta, I just need to take it one day at a time. Thank you so much!

sloane.speaker: sloane
sloane.dialogue: PERIWINKLE! How are you doing on this fine evening?

sloane.speaker: peri
sloane.dialogue: I'm not doing great, Sloane. Even with your words of encouragement, I still can't fly as well as the other swans. Maybe I'm just not strong enough to do this.

sloane.speaker: sloane
sloane.dialogue: NONSENSE! Periwinkle, I told you that strength comes from the heart, not your feathers.

sloane.speaker: sloane
sloane.dialogue: As long as you stay determined, there's nothing you can't do! NOW GET BACK OUT THERE!

sloane.speaker: peri
sloane.dialogue: YOU'RE RIGHT! I AM STRONG! I AM BRAVE! AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!!!!!!!!!

ending4.speaker: peri
ending4.dialogue: Man, that was tough. I didn't make any friends, and I did horrible at flying...

ending4.speaker: peri
ending4.dialogue: But that doesn't mean I should give up! I'm what this flock needs and on my tailfeathers, I'm going to show them that!
